short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds downvote button to posts on Patriots.win

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a downvote button to posts on Patriots.win so you can downvote posts once more. Enjoy your newfound freedom of speech!


This extension simply sets some HTML elements so that the Downvote button is visible (as it was a few months ago). It was changed to be invisible on the client side, however the API endpoint is still accessible. With this extension, you can downvote from the user interface.
